document_data.name: Mount Hlim
document_data.mainbody: '''Mount Hlim''' was the southernmost of the [[Greypeak Mountains]] in the [[Savage Frontier]].
document_data.Geography: Just west of the mountain was [[Highstar Lake]], and the nearby underground dwarfhold of [[Hammer Hall]].
document_data.Notable Locations: * [[Xonthal's Tower (village)|Xonthal's Tower]], a village built at the base of the mountain built around the [[Xonthal's Tower|tower]] after which it was named. Throughout its history the settlement has been taken over by both the [[Zhentarim]], and many years later the [[Cult of the Dragon]].
